notifyChanges

public NotificationMsg notifyChanges(java.lang.String varName,
                                     java.lang.String value)
This method uses the ApAM message model. Each call produce a IlluminationNotificationMsg object and notifies ApAM that a new message has been released.

Returns:
nothing, it just notifies ApAM that a new message has been posted.
